message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we've decided to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1200000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a discounted rate.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. My counteroffer would be $1050000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. After evaluating your proposal, we would like to extend a counteroffer of $1100000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair compromise while still reflecting the value of our asset.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the market value and my budget constraints, I propose a price of $1075000 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. We've carefully considered your proposal and are pleased to counteroffer at $1125000 for the product. We hope this aligns more closely with both our interests and reflects the value of the asset.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to meet my budget. I would like to propose a final price of $1100000 for the product.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. We understand your financial considerations and are willing to accept a counteroffer of $1110000 for the product. We believe this represents a fair compromise and a reasonable valuation.
